resources.string: Explore augmented reality experiences at thINK events and in thINK communications.

thINK is an independent community of Canon Solutions America Production Print customers, solution partners, and print industry experts. Led by some of the most successful inkjet service providers in the country, it provides a forum for members to network, gain knowledge, discuss common challenges, and share best practices.\n\nThe inaugural event of the community of Canon Solutions America Production Print inkjet customers drew more than 350 attendees, making it the largest user group event for inkjet production printing. thINK 2016 promises to be even bigger and better – with expanded conference sessions and projected attendance of more than 400.

The thINK Executive Director and Board Members welcome your input, questions, and comments. Would you like to share your ideas, opinions, and best practices with the community? Do you have suggestions for a blog post, educational session, or community resource that will help you grow your business? Have a question about how you can get involved? Please click on this link and fill out the form to send us a message.
Each partner has a special postcard waiting for you. All of them have an augmented reality experience inside. Some could make you an instant winner.
1. Collect a greeting at every partner table
2. Watch the AR experience with the thINK AR app to find out if you are an instant winner
3. Visit the TREKK booth to get your last greeting and enter the grand prize drawing
4. Post about it on social media using the hashtag: #GreetingsfromthINK
*Grand Prize winners (chosen by random drawing) will be announced Wednesday morning.
You’re An Instant Winner! Claim your prize at the Canon Solutions America area
